references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF 360: Unbounded anti-aliased neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the 3D scene reconstruction task of MVInpainter, as it introduces a method for creating high-quality 3D representations from images.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper provides the foundation for 2D image manipulation in MVInpainter by introducing a high-resolution image synthesis method using latent diffusion.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, enables the use of text prompts to guide image generation and manipulation, which is a key aspect of MVInpainter.

references.paper_title: The unreasonable effectiveness of deep features as a perceptual metric
references.reason: LPIPS, introduced in this paper, is used as a perceptual similarity metric in evaluating the image quality generated by MVInpainter, which is crucial for visual assessment.

references.paper_title: RAFT: Recurrent all-pairs field transforms for optical flow
references.reason: This paper introduces RAFT, an optical flow estimation method used in MVInpainter for providing motion priors, enabling consistent multi-view inpainting.
